amendment.description: To provide safeguards for communications involving persons inside the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3979 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 63. Record Vote Number: 14.

action.text: Amendment SA 3979 proposed by Senator Feingold to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S568-574) To provide safeguards for communications involving persons inside the United States.
